de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Class AbstractSpatialNorm

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractPrimitiveDistanceFunction<NumberVector>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractNumberVectorDistanceFunction
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractNumberVectorNorm
          • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractSpatialNorm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistanceFunction<NumberVector>, Norm<NumberVector>, NumberVectorDistanceFunction<NumberVector>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<NumberVector>, SpatialPrimitiveDistanceFunction<NumberVector>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LorentzianDistanceFunction, LPNormDistanceFunction, MinimumDistanceFunction, OnedimensionalDistanceFunction, SquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction, WeightedSquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction

    public abstract class AbstractSpatialNorm
extends AbstractNumberVectorNorm
implements SpatialPrimitiveDistanceFunction<NumberVector>
    Abstract base class for typical distance functions that allow rectangle-to-rectangle lower bounds. These distances can then be used with R*-trees for acceleration. This class is largely a convenience class, to make implementing this type of distance functions easier.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
